The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.

The distribution of 'X' is as follows: there is an 'X' in the top left, top right, bottom left, and bottom right cells. In the middle row, there are 'X' in the leftmost and rightmost cells. No 'X' is present in the center three cells of the grid.
